segments.text: why are you in such a good mood today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , yesterday , I decided to face my fear of heights .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn't know you were scared of heights ! Was it really bad ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: let me put it this way . I've never seen a professional sorts game in a stadium because I could never get myself to walk to the top of the stairs to sit down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: so what did you do about it yesterday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you're kidding me ! that sounds really scary !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was scary , but it felt great , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: of course I was scared . But I had an instructor that went with me and that helped .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: so have you cured your fear of heights ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so . After I jumped out of the plane , I realized that I should just enjoy life . Worrying about it or not doing things out of fear is just plain silly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , sometimes I get scared when I'm in my apartment all by myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what do you think is going to happen ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I always worry that the door is unlocked or that a window is open and that a stranger will come in and steal my things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it sounds like you just need to be more careful .
segments.speaker: S2
